sub_fields.label: Column Width

sub_fields.instructions: Select the Width of this Particular Column

fields.label: Min Height
fields.name: min_height
fields.instructions: Used to set the minimum height for the column section. Useful for preventing some columns from shrinking too much on mobile.

fields.label: Section Padding X
fields.name: section_padding_x
fields.instructions: Used to set the padding on the X axis for the column container.

fields.label: Section Padding Y
fields.name: section_padding_y
fields.instructions: Used to set the padding on the Y axis for the column container.

fields.label: Mobile Padding X
fields.name: mobile_padding_x
fields.instructions: Used to set the padding on the X axis for the column container on mobile.

fields.label: Mobile Padding Y
fields.name: mobile_padding_y
fields.instructions: Used to set the padding on the Y axis for the column container on mobile.

fields.label: Automatically fit items
fields.name: flex_shorthand
fields.instructions: Forces widths to automatically add up to 100%

fields.label: Remaining Space
fields.name: flex_justify
fields.instructions: Used to set how the remaining space will be distributed. For example, having just two columns with 25% width will result in empty space.

choices.justify-around: Distribute space around columns, similar to above
choices.justify-center: Group columns and distribute space around
choices.justify-start: Group columns and distribute space to the right
choices.justify-end: Group columns and distribute space to the left

fields.label: Vertical Spacing
fields.name: vertical_spacing
fields.instructions: Used to set the vertical spacing of items when on mobile.

fields.label: Horizontal Spacing
fields.name: horizontal_spacing
fields.instructions: Used to set the horizontal spacing of items.

fields.label: Columns
fields.name: columns
fields.instructions: Add your columns here. When setting the width be sure all your widths add up to 100% to avoid unexpected behavior.

sub_fields.label: Width
sub_fields.name: width
sub_fields.instructions: What percentage of the available space should the column take up?
